name: Aditya Engineering
overview:
We, “Aditya Engineering, Chakan,” established in the year 2005 at Pune (Maharashtra, India), are a prominent manufacturer, exporter and supplier of superior quality range of Fixtures, Jigs, Special Purpose Machine, Bushes and Screw & Glass Housing. Our exclusive range includes Motor Housing, Sight Glass Housing, Testing Fixture, Slotting Fixture, Drilling Fixture, etc.

Quality Policy: Being a quality-centric firm, we emphasize on offering the best quality products to our precious clients. We have recruited an adroit team of quality experts that conducts crucial tests using ultramodern testing devices and tools.

Client Satisfaction: As a client-centric organization, we have been able to provide maximum satisfaction to clients by offering them flawless range of products within the stipulated time frame. We have been consistently strengthening our association with customers by offering them supreme quality products in both standard and customized designs.

Why Us?: Our organization is recognized as the leading manufacturer, exporter and supplier of a qualitative assortment of Fixtures, Jigs, Special Purpose Machine, Bushes and Screw, Glass Housing and Industrial Instruments.

Infrastructure: We are supported by a sound infrastructural unit for the production of our extensive range of products. Our state-of-the-art plant spreads over a large area and has all the necessary machinery and ultramodern equipment.
